minions.name: Pack Alpha
minions.description: Special: Before this base scores, each of your minions here gains +1 power until the end of the turn

minions.name: Loup Garou
minions.description: Special: Before this base scores, this minion gains +2 power until the end of the turn

minions.name: Teenage Wolf
minions.description: Talent: This minion gains +1 power until the end of the turn

minions.name: Howler
minions.description: This minion gains +2 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Chew Toy
actions.description: Choose one of your minions. Destroy a minion with lower power at your minion's base

actions.name: Frenzy
actions.description: Each of your minions with power 4 or more gains +1 power until the end of the turn

actions.name: Full Moon
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: Each of your minions here has +1 power

actions.name: Leader of the Pack
actions.description: Play on a minion. Talent: If this minion has the highest power here, you may play an extra action

actions.name: Let the Dog Out
actions.description: Choose one of your minions. Destroy any number of minions at your minion's base whose total power is less than or equal to your minion's power

actions.name: Marking Territory
actions.description: Play on a base. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you have more total power here than each other player, reduce this base's breakpoint to zero

actions.name: Unstoppable
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion cannot be destroyed

actions.name: Moontouched
actions.description: Play on a minion. Talent: If this minion has the highest power here, draw a card
